"Mindful Money Mastery": A 6-week online course that teaches individuals how to manage their finances mindfully, by integrating financial literacy, budgeting, and investing with mindfulness practices such as meditation and journaling.
"The Art of Financial Storytelling": A 4-week online course that teaches individuals how to use storytelling techniques to communicate their financial goals and strategies more effectively.
"Financial Freedom for Creative Entrepreneurs": A 8-week online course that helps creative entrepreneurs and small business owners manage their finances and achieve financial freedom.
"Financial Wellness for the Digital Nomad": A 6-week online course that teaches digital nomads how to manage their finances and achieve financial wellness while traveling the world.
